title: Doctor Privacé & The Secret of Personal Data

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Bonjour, my friend! I am Doctor Privacé, guardian of secrets! The Hacker Lord is collecting people’s private info to build a giant marketing robot. Do you know what counts as personal data?

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Très bien! Quick test: Which of these is personal info?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Muahaha! Pepperoni tells me nothing. But your ID? THAT is delicious. You need a lesson!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Exactly! Identifying info is private. You have talent, petit fromage!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Personal data includes info that identifies you: name, phone, email, address, ID, birthday. Even your cat’s name—if it’s your password!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: So, how does the sneaky Hacker Lord steal your data?

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Yes! Sometimes surveys ask too much. 'What is your mother's maiden name?' Pardon? Non merci!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Oui! Oversharing online helps attackers guess passwords or security questions. Maybe don’t post your address AND your travel plan…

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Correct! Public Wi-Fi is like a suspicious free buffet—you never know who’s watching you eat!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Now let us learn how to protect your precious data. What would you like to know?

options.text: How to talk to apps asking for permissions

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Do NOT share ID numbers, address, phone, constant travel updates, or your bank details. Also, don’t post your pet’s name if it’s your password. Bad combo!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Use HTTPS sites, VPNs on public Wi-Fi, and avoid pirate sites promising movies plus free sunshine.

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Apps often ask for unnecessary permissions. A wallpaper app wanting your GPS? Suspicious! Say NON!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Scenario: A shopping website asks you for your ID number and home address before checkout. What do you do?

options.text: Only provide necessary info and verify the site

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Delicious! Now I have your info. Next I’ll send you discount emails for items you never asked for! Muahaha!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Très bon! Always check what data is required and confirm the website’s identity before sharing.

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Final test! Which is the BEST way to keep private data safe?

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Under the pillow?! What if the Hacker Lord is the tooth fairy?!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Correct! Be mindful, share only necessary info, and protect it wisely. You are now a Privacy Champion!

nodes.speaker: Doctor Privacé
nodes.text: Story <Doctor Privacé & The Secret of Personal Data> complete! Protect your secrets, mon ami!
